name: Lead Generation Manager
description:
What we're looking for

We are looking for an experienced and motivated lead generation manager to join our marketing team. This role is a perfect opportunity for someone experienced in working with CRM software and mass marketing tools to apply their industry knowledge to maximize conversions and drive customer relations.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design email templates and monthly newsletters
  • Endeavor to automate and streamline every possible step in the customer early journey
  • Work closely with the rest of the marketing team to ensure that each of our outbound campaigns run efficiently
  • Conduct thorough A/B testing on templates and search for ones with optimal conversions
  • Work closely with our tech team and our outsourcing agents to ensure data sanity and push for personalization metrics
  • Establish recommendations and conclusions based on the analysis of data


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's / Master’s degree from a top tier university in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering etc)
  • Strong communication skills
  • Upper-intermediate English
  • 3+ years of work experience in Sales, Lead Generation, Marketing, or related, ideally in a consulting or e-commerce environment
  • Proficient in AmoCRM software
  • Own a follow-through and proactive work style
  • Ability to meet deadlines without compromise to quality in a fast-paced, multi-task environment
  • Experience working within the Amazon ecosystem is a plus

About Us

At Accel Club we acquire, scale, and operate e-commerce businesses by integrating them into our platform. Backed by leading investors across technology and commerce, we build a team of A-players and create an environment for everyone to be engaged, challenged, and passionate about work we do. We value result-driven and adventurous professionals ready to gain new experience, learn non-stop, and think big.
